common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_01:
Ever since ya fought for that choice seaweed for
me, all my dishes usin’ it have been big hits![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_02:
Thanks for that! Guess it’s no surprise you did so
well—what with bein’ worthy of Champion Rank![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_03:
Goodness gracious, but do I ever meet all kinds
of people while doin’ this job.[VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_04:
I’ve seen people like yerself who run full speed
ahead like a ragin’ river, and plenty o’ people\r
who settle down like a calm lake.[VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_05:
We older folk tend to prefer the latter, o’ course,
but this ol’ man himself finds that a bit dull.[VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_06:
Rivers flow into the ocean. That water then climbs
up into the clouds an’ becomes rain.[VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_07:
I am Kofu the Torrent! Ever changin’—just like
water! Now come see what I’m made of![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_08:
You really put the pressure on! Guess I should’ve
expected no less from someone with La Primera’s\r
seal of approval! What a catch![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_09:
The wildest currents—for better or worse—pull in
everythin’ around ’em and have really wild and\r
drastic effects on their surroundin’s![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_10:
That makes those friends o’ yours who stay by
your side all the more important.[VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_11:
Phew! Your youthful vigor’s got my motivation
flowin’ up like a rising tide![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_12:
Next time you see Ms. Geeta, tell ’er that ol’
man Kofu’s flowin’ and crashin’ more than ever![VAR 0114(0018)]
common_2020_mizu_020_mizu_13:
Don’t forget to tell ’er, young friend! And you
come back to see me again, now, ya hear?[VAR 0114(0018)]
